author: Kan Ting Chiu J:
casename: International Connex Holdings Pte Ltd v Chan Shing On and Others
counsel: K Muralitherapany and Kenneth Ho (Joseph Tan Jude Benny) for the plaintiff; Tan Kok Heng, Leroy Soloman and Ramesh Chandra (Tan Leroy & Chandra) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Companies/Directors/Breach of duties/Joint-venture company issuing dividends and new shares/Director of joint-venture company also director of investing company/Failing to provide information on joint-venture company/Participating in removal of another director/Whether there was breach of duty to investing company
